{{cpp/ranges/slide_view/iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/slide_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr auto operator*() const;
}}

Returns the current element in the {{tt|slide_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} be the underlying data members. Equivalent to: {{c|return views::counted(current_, n_)}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element, which is an object of {{rlpi|/#Member types|value_type}}.
